channel.title: Another One Of My Ideas!
channel.description: Hello, everyone. I had another idea while playing Halo 2. Well, I began to wonder. Would it be possible to program a real A.I. (like Cortana)? Something that thinks for itself, and follows commands? If so, it would be SO COOL! If you were to be able to do this, what language would you use?

item.title: Another One Of My Ideas!
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Use your brain to write a “brain”.

if (isHungry) eat(); else if (isBored) findSomethingAppealing();

Easy, but just takes a fucking long ass time.

Read full topic

item.title: Another One Of My Ideas!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Any game AI? Like I said, there is Monty which learns how to speak by seeing how you put words together.

Read full topic

item.title: Another One Of My Ideas!
item.dc:creator: @Shadow94 Shadow94
item.description:
@Shadow94 wrote:

What I mean is, a bot that kinda thinks for itself. Not completely, like a real human. I mean like in video games, but more advanced. What language would be used to do it?

Read full topic

item.title: Another One Of My Ideas!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Lolol, it’d take fucking forever to program, but yes.

If they’re uploading it again, search for Monty bot or PIRC Bot.

Read full topic
